description: The most outwardly cheerful person in the series and is http://anidb.net/ch6847 [Utena]`s best friend, but she feels surrounded by "special" people and doesn`t know how to become special herself. She is a co-dependent person who`s only happy when she takes care of people because she doesn`t feel like she has any other talents.
name: Shinohara Wakaba
